<< issingle types module isstruct >>

issparse

Return true if variable var is a sparse array.

Syntax

res = issparse(var)

Input argument

var

a variable

Output argument

res

a logical: true or false

Description

issparse returns a logical 1 if the argument is a sparse array and a logical 0 otherwise.

Examples

A = 1;
res = isnumeric(A)


B = sparse(1);
res = issparse(B)

See also

sparse.

History

Version Description
1.0.0 initial version

Author

Allan CORNET
